response.original_title: خمسون سنة من السينما في المغرب
response.overview: خمسون سنة من السينما في المغرب Fifty Years of Cinema in Morocco, directed by Mohamed Abdaoui and produced by Al Jazeera Documentary, celebrates five decades of Moroccan cinema. Filmed during the 2008 National Film Festival in Tangier, it features interviews with filmmakers, actors, and producers, exploring the industry's history, challenges, and achievements. Through archival footage and personal stories, the documentary highlights Moroccan cinema's growth and its cultural significance.
response.title: خمسون سنة من السينما في المغرب
